verses.kjv: The mighty God, even the LORD, hath spoken, and called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.
verses.ct: The Mighty One, God, the LORD, has spoken and summoned the earth from where the sun rises to where it sets.

verses.kjv: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
verses.ct: From Zion, the most beautiful of places, God has radiated his light.

verses.kjv: Our God shall come, and shall not keep silence: a fire shall devour before him, and it shall be very tempestuous round about him.
verses.ct: Our God is coming and will not remain silent. Fire consumes everything in his path, and a mighty storm swirls around him.

verses.kjv: He shall call to the heavens from above, and to the earth, that he may judge his people.
verses.ct: He summons the heavens above and the earth so that he can judge his people.

verses.kjv: Gather my saints together unto me; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
verses.ct: "Bring my faithful ones together to me — those who sealed a covenant with me through sacrifice."

verses.kjv: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness: for God is judge himself. Selah.
verses.ct: The heavens proclaim his righteousness, because God himself is the judge. Selah.

verses.kjv: Hear, O my people, and I will speak; O Israel, and I will testify against thee: I am God, even thy God.
verses.ct: "Listen, my people, and I will speak. Israel, I will testify against you: I am God, your God.

verses.kjv: I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices or thy burnt offerings, to have been continually before me.
verses.ct: I'm not criticizing you for your sacrifices or your burnt offerings, which are always in front of me.

verses.kjv: I will take no bullock out of thy house, nor he goats out of thy folds.
verses.ct: I don't need a bull from your barn or goats from your pens.

verses.kjv: For every beast of the forest is mine, and the cattle upon a thousand hills.
verses.ct: Every animal in the forest already belongs to me, along with the livestock on a thousand hills.

verses.kjv: I know all the fowls of the mountains: and the wild beasts of the field are mine.
verses.ct: I know every bird in the mountains, and all the wild creatures of the fields are mine.

verses.kjv: If I were hungry, I would not tell thee: for the world is mine, and the fulness thereof.
verses.ct: If I were hungry, I wouldn't ask you for food, because the world and everything in it belongs to me.

verses.kjv: Will I eat the flesh of bulls, or drink the blood of goats?
verses.ct: Do I eat the meat of bulls? Do I drink the blood of goats?

verses.kjv: Offer unto God thanksgiving; and pay thy vows unto the most High:
verses.ct: Instead, offer gratitude to God as your sacrifice, and fulfill your promises to the Most High.

verses.kjv: And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.
verses.ct: Then call on me when trouble comes. I will rescue you, and you will give me glory."

verses.kjv: But unto the wicked God saith, What hast thou to do to declare my statutes, or that thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth?
verses.ct: But to the wicked, God says, "Who gave you the right to recite my laws or speak about my covenant?

verses.kjv: Seeing thou hatest instruction, and casteth my words behind thee.
verses.ct: You despise correction and toss my words aside.

verses.kjv: When thou sawest a thief, then thou consentedst with him, and hast been partaker with adulterers.
verses.ct: When you see a thief, you join right in with him, and you keep company with those who commit adultery.

verses.kjv: Thou givest thy mouth to evil, and thy tongue frameth deceit.
verses.ct: You use your mouth for evil purposes, and your tongue crafts lies.

verses.kjv: Thou sittest and speakest against thy brother; thou slanderest thine own mother’s son.
verses.ct: You sit around talking against your own brother; you slander your own mother's son.

verses.kjv: These things hast thou done, and I kept silence; thou thoughtest that I was altogether such an one as thyself: but I will reprove thee, and set them in order before thine eyes.
verses.ct: You did all these things while I stayed silent, and you assumed I was just like you. But now I will confront you and lay out every charge right in front of you.

verses.kjv: Now consider this, ye that forget God, lest I tear you in pieces, and there be none to deliver.
verses.ct: Think carefully about this, all of you who ignore God, or I will tear you apart with no one to save you.

verses.kjv: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.
verses.ct: Whoever offers praise honors me, and to the one who lives the right way, I will reveal the salvation of God."
